entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
